pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulation Tool for Causal Inference Using Longitudinal Data // Implements a simulation study to assess the strengths and weaknesses of causal inference methods for estimating policy effects using panel data. See Griffin et al. (2021) doi:10.1007/s10742-022-00284-w and Griffin et al. (2022) doi:10.1186/s12874-021-01471-y for a description of our methods.
